articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Panchanga - Uttaradimutt
articles.description:
August 2021
 Plava Samvatsara
Dakshinayana, Varsha Rutu 
Sharavana Maasa, Krishna Paksha
Day: Good
Completed: Sri Krishna Janmastami

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Anandvana beats all convent schools
articles.description: Good foundation helps to build great buildings. Good foundational education builds not only career of kids but builds Nation and Dharma. If you have not heard of Anandavana Gurukula, then its a great missing information and opportunity of life. Know about this great inspirational education institute that can build best career of your kids. Mid of forest and calm environment, great educationists and visiting faculties can stunn you against any convent school that you feel great today.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Krishnam Vande Jagadgurum
articles.description: Krishna never born, but he appeared. Because he is having no birth, he takes various avatara to bless Sajjana and punish Durjana. Janmastami is for us, we should install Lord Krishna in us. We should daily invite him to our mind, soul, feel that he punishing all bad stuffs within us, feel that he is blessng all good things in us.
articles.content: Watch Video of Pt. Kalhapur Pavamanachar

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Powerful and most beneficial Manyusookta
articles.description: saMsRStaM dhanamubhayaM samAkRtamasmabhyaM dattAMvarUNaSca manyUH | bhiyaM dadhAnA hRdayeSu SatravaHparAjitAso apa ni layantAm ||14||saMsRStaM - gathering; dhanaM - wealth; ubhayaM - both; samAkrtaM - collected together; asmabhayaM - for us; dattAM - grant us; varunaH - One who envelopes the three worlds; cha - also; manyuH - yajna (one who performs acts for his devotees); bhiyaM - fear; dadhAnAH - giving; hRudayEShu - inside the heart; shatravaH - enemies; parAjitAsaH - having been conquered; apa ni layantAM - let them go away, cowering in defeat

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Arghya Pradana to Lord Krishna
articles.description: Arghya Pradhana is one of the most important and unique ways to do satkarma in this world. Its only seen in Brahmins and mostly in Madhwas a lot. Krishna Janmastami is followed in this week, please understand Arghya Pradhana and Pooja vidhana by scholars in text - https://www.sumadhwaseva.com/2009/08/krishnastami/ and videos.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Sri Krishna Janmastami 2021
articles.description: Krishna Janmastami is to be celebrated with much more devotion and dedication for both 29 and 30th August 2021. A clarification is provided by mutt that follow Panchanga of mutt and there is no change to that. More details on next slide.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Janmastami 2021 clarification
articles.description:
On 29th Sunday Upavasa and Janmastami Arghya Pooja after moon rise at 11.32PM
On 30th Monday Upavasa till 11.45PM
Pray to Lord to end pandemic and start regular satwik life for all Jeevas on the planet. Krishna will clear all our sins and which are direct cause of Diseases and hence provides healthy life.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Sourabh Das Sahitya a Success story
articles.description: We always think that we can do initiatives and grow to very small extent! but look at live example of something that is path breaking at Sourabh Das Sahitya has achieved. It has record of training 8000+ members, spread in 80 centers and spread across 8 countries!!!, watch video for more. Working at local center under guidance Pt Mukundachar Joshi of Raichur feels its great SATKARMA of life.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Janmastami 2021 clarification
articles.description:
For Sri Vyasaraj mutt(sosale), Sri Raghavendra Mutt, Sri Udupi Mutts
On 30th Monday Upavasa and Janmastami Arghya Pooja after moon rise
On 31st Tuesday Parani in the morning
Pray to Lord to end pandemic and start regular satwik life for all Jeevas on the planet. Krishna will clear all our sins and which are direct cause of Diseases and hence provides healthy life.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Subscribe to Sarvadarshi Taranga for more
articles.description: Sarvadarshi Taranga - fully focused to provide you a NON-BREAKING, non-contraversial news that helps to be always connected with Madhwa community and also to specific mutt that you belong to. This also bring lots of information from within such a great community where you can find programs, sales, events, volunteer opportunity, give-back to community, panchanga, special days, aaradhana information, voting for specific topics, kids corners, Tatva/Sidhantha corner to learn and enhance your knowledge

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Great contents at RayaraKrupa website
articles.description: Really great stuffs at rayarakrupa.org site where you can find good amount of paintings, articles and also useful information. This is done by SHRI ANEL KUMAR, Founder & Director â€“ PUNASCHETANA TRUST, he elaborates on the core vision, mission and purpose of this spiritual initiative, RAYARA KRUPA.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Unique job opportunities for freshers
articles.description: As technology is changing and tough to get job in IT, here are few ways that you can crack job opportunities. Skill yourself in DevOps, Cloud, Building scalable products, Automation Testing etc. Where today most candidates fail today - not knowing end to end process of software development, how large software code gets developed and managed within organization. Learn from your seniors and friends. Dont be in silos

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: We are in Dadhi Vrata of Chaturmasa
articles.description: From 18 Aug 2021 Dadhi Vrata. Chaturmasa Vrata brings a great control over will power and also self control. Dadhi vrata marks second maasa in this Parva Kala. One should avoid eating Dadhi or Curds or Mosaru. Dont forget to spend time in doing spritual work which is most important.
articles.content: TRY: Practice doing Vrata its possible

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Pavitraropana - Pavitra Dhara wearing
articles.description: Pavitraropana is observed by all Madhwas to wear a specially knotted thread around neck on Shravana Shukla Dwadashi. This year its on 19th August 2021. This ritual enables one to get returns of their Devara Pooja performance through out the year. Hence on Dwadashi it should be submitted to GOD and then wear it with special mantras.
articles.content: PDF by: Dr. B R Venkateshachar

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Sri Sudha - spiritual partner for life
articles.description: A great book is more than any friends in life, as saying goes you cannot have any better book than the books which gives thoughts of Lord Vishnu and Bhagavatha jnana. Sri Sudha is most effective family member to be successful in life. Get your copy soon - 8762629132

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Skill yourself to get a job
articles.description: While many young talent not getting job in community, there are large number of requirements open at big organizations where they are not getting right candidates. The gap is due to skills missing in candidates to perform basic job in a company vs. their school projects. Get trained rightly to get better jobs.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Rajajinagar see a new Gurukula to give kids basics for free
articles.description: Pt. Vadirajachar Deshpande, who graduated from Sri Vedesh Teerth - Sri Madhav teerth Vidyapeeth, Mannur started a small initiative named as Rajajinagar Gurukula to train kids on basics of Madhwa Sampradaya for kids. This has seen almost 25 kids now getting basic mantra, slokas and shistachar trainings. During pandemic situation group used online meeting facilities to run the weekly classes. This is done for FREE and interested parents can talk to Pt. Vadirajachar to join their kids to this.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Grand Tulasi Vana of Volunteers at Magadi Road
articles.description: There is grand Tulasi vana purely run by volunteers and serves tulasi to manay occasions. This vana is brain child of one of the volunteers Sri Sudheendra Katte and supported by many volunteers. Every weekend there are volunteer efforts to pluck tulasi dala and also clean the field, remove weeds and remove seeds etc. Each volunteer feels great service here. Such work need to be well supported by the society more and more.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Get your softskill improved - says Neeraj
articles.description: For our continued success and progressive growth many skills needed, at most important one is your soft skills, this is where leaders get differentiated from ordinary people in society. Remember one who goes just small extramile is called winner while whole world forgets second, third place person in race - says Mr. Neeraj

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Donate to Satkarta where transperancy matters
articles.description: Satkarta is the one unique program and leading program for crowd funding and giveback thoughts. Being in the field for 5 years now, Satkarta has completed as many as 21 projects to help Madhwas in Healthcare, educational, tough times, skill development and legal areas. Satkarta team is growing and its adding lots of volunteers day-by-day to fullfill need of large community.

articles.author: Madhavarao Kulkarni
articles.title: Expose your kids to rituals for their better future
articles.description: If we dont give opportunity to our kids to learn from work they either dont learn them or they are eager to learn elsewhere. Organizing events is one of the skills where many adults would love, if you have not given in future may in their school, offices they do it. But if you give them responsibility to organize, evolve think and make one festival at home fully!!! that makes them more learning and responsbile citizen at home itself...
